short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clocky is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clocky provides all the information you need to stay ahead of everything. We give you the option to work in a multi time zone environment. 
The Clokcy extension groups together clocks from all the time zones that are relevant to you and conveniently shows you the information you need in clear and visible way.
The Clocky extension helps you stay connected with every part of the world. Perfect for people who has relatives or loved ones living overseas, or for those who work internationally.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Clocky extension and setting the new tab to that provided by Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use: https://clockyext.com/terms.html and Privacy Policy: https://clockyext.com/privacy.html
